Scrap Debugging


# Check what the "age_bacon" collumn is

```{r}
# uses pollen_ts3 from the pred_build_data.r file
bacon_cols <- grep("^bacon_draw", names(pollen_ts3), value = TRUE)

pollen_ts3$bacon_mean <- rowMeans(
  pollen_ts3[, bacon_cols],
  na.rm = TRUE
)

pollen_ts3$bacon_diff <- pollen_ts3$bacon_mean - pollen_ts3$age_bacon

all.equal(
  pollen_ts3$bacon_mean,
  pollen_ts3$age_bacon,
  tolerance = 1e-6
)


summary(pollen_ts3$bacon_diff)


```
